text: Babolat is a French tennis, badminton, and squash equipment company, headquartered in Lyon, best known for its strings and tennis racquets which are used by several top players. The company has made strings since 1875, when Pierre Babolat created the first strings made of natural gut. Babolat continued to focus on strings until 1994, when it became a "total tennis" company, producing also racquet frames and selling them in Europe. It then expanded sales to Japan, and later to the United States in 2000. Sales of Babolat racquets increased rapidly in North America and Europe. Babolat is also a pioneer in connected sport technology and launched a connected tennis racket in 2014https://www.theguardian.com/sport/2015/may/04/babolat-play- smart-racket-tennis and a connected wrist-worn tennis wearable with PIQ in 2015.https://www.engadget.com/2015/08/28/babolat-pop-piq-sensors/ The Babolat Pop is used worldwide, and one of the leaders in tennis sensors. == Sponsorships == === Men === Source: Rafael Nadal with Babolat AeroPro Drive at Roland Garros 2007 * Rafael Nadal * Jo-Wilfried Tsonga * Ryan Harrison * Albert_Ramos_Viñolas * Benoit Paire * Fabio Fognini * Sam Querrey * Viktor Troicki * Stéphane Houdet * Dominic Thiem * Mikael Ymer * Thanasi Kokkinakis * Federico Delbonis * Felix Auger-Aliassime * Samuel Groth * Taro Daniel * Evgeny Donskoy * Jack Sock * Yūichi Sugita * Jordan Thompson * Thiago Monteiro * Cristian Garín * Cameron Norrie * Andy Roddick retired * Fernando González retired * Carlos Moyá retired * Mariano Puerta retired === Women === * Julia Görges * Pauline Parmentier * Elena Vesnina * Alizé Cornet * Kristýna Plíšková * Karolína Plíšková * Garbiñe Muguruza * Caroline Wozniacki * Catherine "CiCi" Bellis * Timea Bacsinszky * Johanna Konta * Zheng Saisai * Anett Kontaveit * Danielle Collins * Camila Giorgi * Kim Clijsters retired * Li Na retired ==References== ==External links== * Category:Tennis equipment manufacturers Category:Badminton equipment manufacturers Category:Sporting goods manufacturers of France Category:Companies established in 1875 Category:Sport in Lyon Category:Manufacturing companies based in Lyon Category:1875 establishments in France Category:French brands
title: Babolat
